attributes.action: Cancel removal of Birmingham Corporation St Bus Stops.
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned object to the lack of consultation or publicity about the intended permanent removals of all the bus routes through Corporation Street, Stephenson Street and Navigation Street to make way for a short extension of the Metro.  We demand that this scheme be halted until there has been consultation and public debate.
www.tramscam.com

rejection.details: This is a matter for Birmingham City Council and Centro.
